title: Easy sausage and bean casserole
ingredients: ['4-5 cooked sausages', '15-20cm length chorizo sausage', '2-3 cloves garlic', '1 red or green pepper', '1 tin of good quality baked beans', '1-2 teaspoons of tomato puree', '1-2 teaspoons of paprika', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'fresh parsely or coriander to garnish']
